name: ngepet simulator 4 special edition
description:
Description:

Our game development for Global Game Jam 2016.

A man found himself strangled in a huge amount of debt. And he needs to pay it immediately. His Waifu suggested him to do "Ngepet". A mystical ritual in Indonesia culture where people turn himself into a demi-pig and steal money from neighbours at night.

How to play:

You play as The Waifu who observe your surrounding and tell what you should do. Steal from the house as many as you can before your transformation energy runs out. Try to hide from patrols. If you got captured, you lost all of your money.

Your Waifu need to instruct you multiple times, because you can't hear her well in a pig form...

Enjoy.
